charges.charge_disposition: Imprisoned for a term of six (6) months. The defendant shall voluntarily surrender to the U.S. Marshal for this district on or before 12:00 noon on 4/17/95, or at such other time and place as designated by the United States Bureau of Prisons. Upon release from custody, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of three (3) years. Special Conditions of Supervised Release include: Community confinement as designated by the USPO for a period of three (3) months to commence immediately upon release from incarceration; defendant shall obtain and maintain full employment and the defendant shall pay restitution in the amount of $24,000.00 on a schedule to be determined by the USPO over the period of Supervised Release. Defendant shall pay a special assessment of $50.00 for counts 2,6,7 &; 10 for a total of $200.00 which shall be due immediately. AMENDED JUDGMENT-The sentence imposed on Counts 2, 6,7, and 10 shall run concurrently. (2)
